com.isoterik.mgdx.ai.fsm.conditions

Class OrCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isoterik.mgdx.ai.fsm.conditions.GroupCondition
      • com.isoterik.mgdx.ai.fsm.conditions.OrCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICondition

    public class OrCondition
extends GroupCondition
    A condition that performs logical OR operation on all given conditions. The condition is satisfied if any of the given conditions is satisfied.
    See Also:
    GroupCondition
